name: Sacred Gold
storyline: The shadows of evil have fallen on the kingdom of Ancaria. It is the time for heroes to rise again and journey into the perilous world of Sacred. Hold grip your shield, sharpen your sword, advance your magical spells, and battle bravely blood-thirsty armies of orcs, lumbering ogres, and relentless undead skeletons. Destroy ruthlessly undead wizards and rotting desert mummies. Slay in half hellish demons and spear legendary dragons. With blazing magic and sharpened steel, prepare to embark on an epic quest of fantasy adventure and heroism.
summary:
Sacred Gold is the complete Sacred collection in one box, containing the full version of Sacred, winner of the "Best Roleplaying Game 2004" award from PC GAMER, Sacred Plus, and Sacred Underworld.
This is the new name in Action-RPGs. Sacred delivers a huge, elaborate world comprising 16 regions beset with heroic quests, battle-hardened warriors, and horrific enemies. Ancaria consists of highly detailed landscapes, complete with villages and towns, and also features a day/night cycle with varying weather systems. Regions vary from forests and mountains to deserts, catacombs, and ice-covered landmasses. More than three-quarters of the world is open to the players from the very start - no unlocks are needed. This is truly an epic RPG and enthralling storyline with over 30 main quests and 200 sub-quests and dynamic quests.
Choose from eight heroic characters: Gladiator, Seraphim, Daemon, Dwarf, Wood Elf, Battlemage, Dark Elf, and Vampiress.
Use hundreds of unique weapons, armors, and set items. Collect artifacts and forge all-powerful weapons!
Learn Combat Arts, develop new skills, and customize devastating combo-attacks.

Sacred Plus incorporates all of the feedback from the player community since the first release of Sacred. This includes an optimized interface, and many completely new features: two new regions, two additional main quests, new item sets and weapons, and many new creature types which make adventuring in Ancaria even more dangerous.

In Sacred Underworld, Ancaria is facing a threat far greater than ever before. The now-familiar world continues to evolve, with existing Sacred players able to import their old characters into the Underworld.
